description: The 19-year-old loose-head has played for England U18s and Wales Under-20s.
title: Louie Trevett: Scarlets sign prop on loan from Bristol Bears
title_page: Louie Trevett: Scarlets sign prop on loan from Bristol Bears - BBC Sport
maintext:
Scarlets have signed Wales Under-20s prop Louie Trevett on a short-term loan deal from Bristol Bears.
The 19-year-old loose-head arrives at Parc y Scarlets as cover following an injury suffered by Wales prop Kemsley Mathias in March.
Trevett helped Wales finish third in the 2025 U20 Six Nations table in which Richard Whiffen's side earned wins against England, Ireland and Italy.
He has also played three senior games for Bristol this season, each of them in the Premiership Cup.
